main_definition: A tape is a long, narrow strip of material used for various purposes such as recording data, joining items together or marking measurements.

meanings_and_examples.example: I recorded the basketball game using my magnetic tape recorder.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adhesive strip for joining items together
meanings_and_examples.example: I used a clear adhesive tape to stick the broken pieces of my phone screen back in place.
I marked the wall with different colored tapes for measuring distances during renovation work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Tape music or electronic sound recording medium
meanings_and_examples.example: The DJ played a track made using magnetic tape recordings at the party last night.
I used packing tape to seal the box and protect its contents during shipping.
